app_name: 美食天下 - 菜谱大全
description:
这里是热爱美食、追求美好的吃货社区，汇聚海量菜谱的常备工具，令厨房与餐桌成为一家人妙不可言的愉悦生活。
专注美食的吃货社区，汇聚海量菜谱的常备工具，令厨房与餐桌成为一家人妙不可言的愉悦生活。
在这里，最活跃的美食杰出作者与热爱生活的美食家们，通过锅碗瓢盆、菜豆果蔬，为您呈现图文并茂、无比详细的菜谱，以及挥洒自如、满座惊艳的创意美食。

*** 不忘初心，我们致力做最棒的美食APP ***

【简洁：清新风格，便捷操作】
全新设计的简美界面，配合大量的高清美食图片，使得优质的内容更加凸显。
适配酷酷的深色模式，并优化 iPad 大屏浏览体验。
【高效：海量菜谱，精准直达】
我们将美食天下上百万篇菜谱，结合十多年的运营经验、菜谱大数据，进行了多达14个维度数百种分类。包括家常菜谱、西餐菜谱、烘焙食谱、儿童菜谱，等等。同时我们全新改版搜索功能，无论是菜名还是食材，通过搜索功能，都能直达你的心头好。
汇集早餐、烘焙、凉菜、热菜、小吃、煲汤、川菜、粤菜、孕妇、产妇、婴儿、减肥等食物食谱， 是下厨房必备烹饪软件。
【愉悦：人气社区，美得冒泡】
点赞、关注、整理菜单 —— 放慢生活，为爱洗手做羹汤。享受这种简单而美好的生活方式。
全新装潢的美食广场，使得互动与沟通更加便捷有爱。上传您的美食照片吧，即时得到无数网友的喜欢与反馈！

---- 联系我们 ----
- 微信公众号与微博：美食天下
- 合作与建议：we@meishichina.com

PHIPAX  GO (PGO!) is an innovative platform built to assist businesses and individuals with reliable online ordering and on demand delivery services in Port Moresby.
 
We offer same day or scheduled purchases and delivery bookings via our mobile app with live tracking GPS technology enabling customers to view their package location from purchase, pick up to drop off in real time.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Find the best food-delivery deals in one app. Browse active coupons from Uber Eats, Wolt, DoorDash, Glovo, and more. Filter by service, cuisine, discount type, or location to save on every order. View full offer details, copy codes instantly, and open deals directly in your delivery app. Track favorites and get alerts before they expire.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

Cut down on food waste by cooking with what you already have. Food Simp recommends recipes by ingredients from your pantry, plans your week, and builds smart grocery lists - fast.

What you can do
- Find recipes by ingredients you have at home (no last-minute store runs)
- Plan meals for the week in minutes
- Turn missing ingredients into a tidy grocery list
- Personalize for vegan, vegetarian, keto, low-carb, dairy-free, and more
- Get dinner ideas that fit your pantry and preferences
- Save time and money with fewer wasted ingredients

Why people love it
- Simple, clean, and fast to use
- New free recipes added monthly
- Helps reduce food waste

Subscriptions
Food Simp offers optional auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment is charged to your Apple ID account. Subscriptions renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage or cancel in Account Settings after purchase. Any free trial converts to a paid subscription unless canceled before the trial ends.

Privacy Policy: https://foodsimp.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://foodsimp.com/terms-conditions

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Welcome to the Tasty App – your ultimate cooking companion, featuring over 10,000 delicious recipes with video, step-by-step cooking mode, personalized recommendations, a thriving community of home chefs, and recipe shopping and seamless checkout. Tasty brings you the best of food and recipe discovery from the internet’s favorite food brand.

Key Features:

10,000+ Recipes and Collections: Explore a vast library of mouth-watering dishes, complete with video guides, step-by-step instructions, and recommendations tailored to the current season, time of day, and special occasions.

AI Botatouille: Powered by ChatGPT API, our AI assistant helps you find recipes that match your preferences and tastes, making it easy to discover new dishes and expand your culinary horizons.

Shoppable Recipe Integration: Shop for affordable recipes and get your groceries delivered or picked up through Walmart, saving you both time and money.

Tasty Community: Connect with fellow food enthusiasts, share photos of your creations, and get inspired by the dishes others have cooked up in our vibrant and supportive community.

Tips and Ratings: Learn from Tasty Creators and the Community, with helpful tips and ratings on every recipe, ensuring your cooking experience is a success.

Personalized Cookbooks: Save your favorite recipes to your profile and organize them into custom cookbooks, making it easy to find and revisit your favorite dishes.

Ingredient Search: Find the perfect recipe based on ingredients you have on hand, with our innovative "ingredient search" feature that generates dish ideas from just 3 ingredients.

Adjustable Serving Sizes: Easily adjust serving sizes per recipe, with metric values side-by-side with US measurements, accommodating users both within and outside the US.

Connect with Creators: See recipes from and interact with your favorite Tasty Creators, learn their cooking secrets, and get inspired by their culinary expertise.

Ready to embark on a delicious cooking journey? Download the Tasty App today and unlock a world of culinary inspiration at your fingertips!

If you have any trouble with your app please email us at support@buzzfeed.com so we can help! Don’t forget to check out Tasty on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube!

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see https://www.nielsen.com/us/en/legal/privacy-statement/digital-measurement/#choices for more information about Nielsen’s measurement software and learn about your choices with regard to NIELSEN’s measurement. Additionally, usage of the Tasty app is subject to our privacy policy and terms of use.

License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

We're Australia's most affordable meal kit - for people who want good food without the fuss.

Our mission is to make cooking as easy & convenient as possible. Our meal planner app offers fuss-free, 4-step recipes and fresh, pre-portioned ingredients delivered straight to your door.

With 35+ recipes on the menu each week, you can whip up crowd-pleasers, global cuisines & kid-friendly dinners in as little as 15 minutes. 

We're a flexible meal planner, because we get it - life gets in the way. You can pause or skip a week at any time, there's no lock-in contracts!

No more takeaway guilt, no more fridge staring or panic-searching "easy recipes" at 7pm. Get your sanity back with foolproof food and easy dinner recipes at affordable prices.

When cooking is this easy, you'll never look back.

HOW DOES EVERYPLATE WORK?

1. Choose a meal plan & box size to suit your household. Or size up for leftovers!

2. Scroll through 35+ recipes each week and choose food that makes you drool. You can plan dinners up to 4 weeks in advance.

3. Our warehouse heroes pack your box with fresh, perfectly pre-portioned ingredients. Which means no food waste!

4. Your box arrives on your doorstep, at a time you choose (yes, it's that easy).

5. Get cooking! Follow our easy, 4-step recipe cards and knock your own socks off with good food that always hits the spot.

There's no fancy tools, no fancy recipes and no complicated clean ups. It's easy, wholesome cooking - completely uncomplicated. We're a meal planner that has your back. Just great dinners, for less. 

Get stuck in!


WHAT DOES EVERYPLATE OFFER?

- 35+ rotating recipes with new dinners to discover every week.

- New recipe collections so you'll never get bored! Choose from easy, 4 step recipes like Little Chef, that get the kids involved in cooking, Air Fryer Easy meals ready in as little as 15 minutes, and Crowd Pleasers that satisfy the whole family.

- Add extra portions & supermarket items to your box, including extra proteins like juicy chicken, beef mince, salmon and prawns.

- Stock up on food & grocery essentials like soups, ready to heat meals, desserts, fresh produce and snacks.

- An affordable, flexible meal planner that delivers seriously tasty food straight to your door.

- Time, effort and money saved, so you can reclaim your evenings to do what matters.


WHAT DO OUR CUSTOMERS SAY?*

"Great portions, good food and easy to prepare. Love not having to think what's for dinner"

"Excellent! Saves a lot of time and meal-planning stress!"

"One of the better value meal kits, I have done a fair few orders now and never had a problem. The family is always very impressed with the taste and quality."

"The quality is great, selections are plentiful and every meal has been a hit with the family. Loving the desserts too."

"My husband and I work long hours and Everyplate has made planning, shopping, dinner prep and cooking a breeze! We choose our meals, it's delivered to our door on our chosen delivery day with recipe cards, and the meals are delicious."

"The recipes are so easy to follow and delicious! As someone who has many recipe books, I have found the recipes much easier to follow and this helps me cook with my teenage son, making meal-time fun!"

"Good variety of meals, easy to follow cooking directions, delivery and communication are excellent but best of all, meals are delicious and saves me time and money. 10 out of 10 EP"

*Feedback from real customers, sourced from TrustPilot

Transform your kitchen into a magical bakery with our comprehensive cake recipes app, specially crafted for British bakers who love creating memorable treats for every occasion.

Whether you're planning the perfect Halloween party or simply want to master the art of baking, our extensive collection of tried-and-tested recipes will guide you from novice to confident baker.

This Halloween season, discover spine-tingling cake creations that will wow your guests! From ghoulish chocolate sponges and pumpkin spice delights to eerie red velvet creations and wickedly decorated cupcakes, our Halloween-themed recipes bring the frightful fun to your kitchen. Each spooky recipe includes detailed decoration guides, ingredient substitutions available in UK supermarkets, and pro tips for achieving that perfect haunting appearance.

Our baking guide features hundreds of recipes organised by skill level, occasion, and dietary requirements. Master classic British favourites like Victoria sponge and lemon drizzle, explore international sensations, or venture into gluten-free and vegan alternatives. Every recipe includes clear step-by-step instructions, precise measurements in metric units, and helpful photos to ensure your baking success.

Key features that make baking brilliant:
• Seasonal recipe collections updated throughout the year
• Smart shopping lists with UK ingredient availability
• Timer functions and conversion tools for perfect results
• Decoration tutorials with video guides
• Difficulty ratings suitable for beginners to advanced bakers
• Personalised favourites and recipe notes
• Nutritional information and serving suggestions

From intimate afternoon tea gatherings to grand celebration centrepieces, our recipes cater to every British baking tradition whilst embracing modern trends and dietary needs. Special sections cover cake decorating techniques, troubleshooting common baking disasters, and seasonal ingredient guides.

Healthy eating can be easy with our menu of fresh, ready-made meals and more! Download our App and sign up to a flexible plan today to discover the convenience of meals delivered to your door that are ready in minutes – no cooking or cleaning required! 

HOW TO MEAL PREP WITH OUR APP  
Plan ahead from the palm of your hand with our free and easy to use App. Here’s some handy info to get you started with a personalised meal plan.

1 PICK A PLAN
Choose from an Everyday Healthy, Low Calorie, Vegetarian or Flexitarian plan and select from a large variety of meals to suit your taste. No matter your health or nutrition goals, we’ll always have something to suit and make healthy eating simple for you. 

2 CHOOSE YOUR MEALS 
Choose from 60 tasty meals, including exciting new meals every week and customer favourites. Plus, there’s a tasty range of snacks and drinks that are perfect for on-the-go. Achieve your nutrition or fitness goals, whatever they may be with a meal plan that’s completely flexible and personalised.  

3 DELIVERED FRESH TO YOUR DOOR 
Your meals are cooked in-house using farm-fresh ingredients, before being packed and delivered fresh to your door at a time that suits you. Healthy eating doesn’t get easier!

4  SIMPLY HEAT, EAT AND ENJOY! 
No cooking, cleaning or thinking about nutrition required, simply heat your tasty meal for a few minutes and enjoy!

WHY YOUFOODZ?

FRESH, NEVER FROZEN
All our meals are cooked in-house using farm-fresh ingredients before being packed with care and delivered fresh to your door. Sign up today to discover the convenience of a fresh and tasty meal that’s ready-to-heat.  

NUTRITIONALLY-BALANCED MEALS
Each meal is perfectly balanced with top-quality protein, carbohydrates, vegetables and healthy fats & endorsed by a Dietitian. Nutrition is important to us, and we work hard to make healthy eating easy while also ensuring you get meals that are tasty too! 

NEW MEALS EVERY WEEK 
Each week, there’s 20 new meals to discover. No matter what your taste or preference, we’ve got something to suit with our large variety of tasty meals in a range of cuisines. No matter what you choose, healthy eating is taken care of with a meal delivery from us! 

FLEXIBLE PLANS 
With no lock-in plans, you can pause, skip or cancel anytime. Your meal choices, and any changes to your account just need to be made your weekly cut-off time. All the information you need about your meal plan can be found in the app, and it’s easy to update when you’re on-the-go. 

EARN REWARDS & SHARE FREE MEALS 
Gain access to exclusive offers, earn Youfoodz credit and share free boxes with friends and family through our refer a friend program. 

SAVE TIME 
With Youfoodz, there’s no shopping, cooking or cleaning required. Simply choose your meals every week and we’ll take care of getting your healthy meals to your door fresh. By signing up, you’ll quickly discover that healthy eating can be easy when you have a tasty meal on hand. 

PLAN AHEAD AND STAY ON TRACK 
It’s easy to meal prep for you, a friend or partner with our customisable meal plans. No matter what your health, fitness or nutrition goals, we’ve got something to suit, from low calorie lunches to high-protein dinners. Consistency is key when it comes to nutrition, so why not order tasty meals for you, a gym buddy, friend or family member? 

HAVE QUESTIONS? 
Find answers to commonly asked questions on a range of topics including nutrition, meals, deliveries and more on our FAQs page at Youfoodz.com/contact. 

SUPPORT 7 DAYS A WEEK 
Our Customer Care team is here to help seven days a week.

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs!

Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
